definition: bubbling with humor (idiom); witty and interesting
surname Rao
rich/abundant/exuberant/to add for free/to throw in as bonus/to spare/to forgive/despite/although
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
wind/news/style/custom/manner/CL:陣|阵[zhen4],絲|丝[si1]
interesting/to interest

sentences.english: I hope the next speaker dishes up his arguments in a more interesting manner.
sentences.chinese: 我希望下一个发言人更加饶有风趣地提出他的论点。

sentences.english: Started in the Southern Song Dynasty riddles , lively, interesting sense of humor.
sentences.chinese: 始于南宋的灯谜，生动活泼，饶有风趣。

sentences.english: He met many interesting people in his travels.
sentences.chinese: 在旅行中他碰到了很多饶有风趣的人。
